This article is about the standard domain. For the prestige domain, see [[Glory prestige domain]].''
The '''Glory domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with [[spell]]s and powers inspired by glory.{{cite book/Book of Exalted Deeds|87}}
document_data.Powers: The cleric's ability to [[turn undead]] was improved.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[disrupt undead]]'', ''[[glorious raiment]]'', and ''[[searing light]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[celestial brilliance]]'', ''[[crown of flame]]'', and ''[[bolt of glory]]''. Those that were masters of this domain had access to ''[[sunbeam]]'', ''[[crown of glory]]'', and ''[[blinding glory]]''.
